citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15 AM on
07-Sep-16.
Knocked on door. Left voicemail.
Additional Inspectors
Mchenry Kerry, Veterinary Medical Officer
